#summary Quick start

== Import dati dall'esterno ==

{{{
./strategico.R --project.name=sample --cmd=import
}}}

== Eval/Run Engine ==
{{{
./strategico.R --project.name=sample --cmd=eval_items --id.min=1 --id.max=3 --item.values=VALUE1,VALUE2 -p "try.models=c('mean')"
}}}

== Eval/Run engine (dbsummary records/items with Run=1) ==
{{{
./strategico.R --project.name=sample --cmd=eval_items_from_db -v VALUE1
}}}

== Eval/Run engine for a generic (unknown item) TS ==
{{{
./strategico.R --project.name=sample --cmd=eval_ts --ts.string=1,2,32,32,32,33,32,32,32,32,32,3,6,7,8,8,99,9,90 --ts.start=2001-1 --ts.freq=2 -i 4343 -p "try.models=c('mean')"
}}}
